**  🔊 日志 **

> 日志目录:
* Window: `%APPDATA%\Frpc-Desktop\logs\`
* MacOS: `~/Library/Logs/Frpc-Desktop/logs/`
* Linux: `~/Library/Logs/Frpc-Desktop/`
